title: FS/FT 2 T206 McQuillan (Namesless miscut, w/bat,) and Joe Lake (w/ball)
author: wazoo

posts.post_title: FS/FT 2 T206 McQuillan (Namesless miscut, w/bat,) and Joe Lake (w/ball)
posts.post_content:
Hey guys today I got for sale a t206 Bridwell, Lake, and Mcquillan. Id like to either sell or trade these cards for cards I need for my set! 

For sale:
Bridwell - [STRIKE]for trade but will consider offers[/STRIKE]
McQuillan - [STRIKE]$35[/STRIKE] $30(factory miscut, missing name)
Lake - [STRIKE]$20[/STRIKE] $18

Please add an additional $2 for shipping. Thank you. If you would like to submit trade offers I'm totally up for it! I am looking for Lajoies, Bakers, other HOFers, Southern leaguers, and Hindus. Of course, money can be added! Thank you :)

If you need better pictures please send me your email address. I had to post the photos from my phone so it was harder. Sorry for all the extra posts. Thanks guys :)
Hey Bill, I sent you a PM back.
Bridwell has been sold. Thank you :) will consider offers on the others!
Just a friendly bump! Send me a PM :D
